update log
comid = #{comid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update log set comid = #{comid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otime = #{otime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responseTime = #{responsetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from log where comid = #{comid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY lid DESC
